title: remaking conditions riot?
body: so i get remaking is cool and all, some use it to troll but most of the time its really good, however i was just in a ranked, and the enemy team had an afk or something not to sure, however we got first blood pretty early on, but then they remade, i was under the impression we couldnt do that, am i just wrong or whats the deal?

replies.body:
Also getting a remake penalty if your game crashes or fails is pretty brutal or just down right irritating. 

I had a game where i was so happy to play it, perfect teams for me to vs and play with... then black screen, game wont load. Reload game. Log in, Reconnect, black screen. Relog, then try again multiple times.. keep hitting reconnect nothing happens. Then i get in... to the end game chat and get a AFK warning and lock out for hextech loot along with a 20-LP... Does the game not see i am trying to reconnect? Maybe you guys should put in a system that checks if there was an actual issue and send it in before instantly punishing the poor person involved. I didn't plan on leaving or  trolling my team =(...

Not to mention my team most likely reported me at the end of the game.

I heard the remake thing was revoked to prevent people running down mid to stop the remake happening and force a 4v5.

Though Seras thing sounds about right.
If the player is marked as dc/afk before first blood you can still remake, if they are marked as dc/afk after first blood you cannot. Hopefully that clarified for ya :)
